<br /><br />

<h4 class="f16">号称中国第一超跑，对手都在500万以上！这台128万的国产车你买吗</h4>

<br><div class="tips" style="width:auto"><SCRIPT LANGUAGE="JavaScript">spinit();</SCRIPT></div><div class="c"></div>

<br /><div class="tpc_content do_not_catch" id="conttpc">超跑，是个会让人肾上腺素飙升的话题！如果在超跑前面加上国产两个字呢？最近某车企就说他们造出了“中国第一超跑”……<br><br><br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s1.gifyu.com/images/pic_002821c27dcc07e6956.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s1.gifyu.com/images/pic_003a3cb6fd16f5da06a.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s1.gifyu.com/images/pic_00417aa1bd634546349.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_00584221155d554e0c2.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_006edbac33acd3a828e.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_007695b1782920f89ef.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_008232c1297e751cd72.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_009412ce3598fdea7b8.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_01066bdad6cd8e198ad.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s1.gifyu.com/images/pic_011b21b70835292ef74.jpg'>&nbsp;<br>参考资料：<br><br>[1]李永钧. 国产跑车梦圆何日[J]. 上海经济, 2007(12):2.<br><br>[2]陆好源.论中国新能源超跑汽车的兴起[J].时代汽车,2017(06):28-29+31.<br><br>[3]“城市里灵活的猛兽”——中国首款纯电动超跑前途K50上市[J].中国汽车市场,2018(19):37.<br><br>[4]黄琳,赵毅. 打造百万纯电超跑 埃安谋求科创板上市[N]. 中国经营报,2022-09-26(C07).<br><br>[5] 埃安品牌之夜暨量产超跑发布会

			<br><br><div onclick="clickLike(5338099, 'h', 't')" class="t_like" id="like5338099">赞(16)</div>

</div>

</td></tr></table>

</th></tr>

<script>
var charset='gbk';
var imgpath='images';
var stylepath='wind';

$('.sptable_do_not_remove h4:eq(0)').append('<span class=serdta></span>');
$(document).ready(function(){
	r9aeadS();
	$('img[ess-data]').each(function(){
		if($(this).attr('ess-data').indexOf('sinaimg')>0){
			$(this).attr('ess-data', $(this).attr('ess-data').replace(/https:/, "http:"));
		}
		$(this).attr('src', $(this).attr('ess-data'));
		$(this).css('cursor', 'pointer');
		$(this).on('load', function(){checkBigImage($(this))});
		$(this).click(function(){
			window.open('https://2023.redircdn.com/?action=image&url='+encodeURIComponent($(this).attr('data-link'))+'&src='+encodeURIComponent($(this).attr('src')));
			return false;
		});
	});
});

function adhtml(tpcHtml){
	$('.tpc_content:eq(0)').html(tpcHtml);
}

function r9aeadS(){
	// v20211210 Blocking ads will cause your filters to be targeted and being followed by our technical department, resulting in the inability to display content
	var blockText = '去广告插件屏蔽, 请等待10秒, 或将其关闭即刻恢复浏览';
	if($('.sptable_do_not_remove td').css('display')=='none' || $('.tips').css('display')=='none' || $('.tips').css('height')=='0px' || $('.tips').css('height')=='1px' || $('.tips').css('visibility')=='hidden'){
		var tpcHtml = '';
		setTimeout(function(){ tpcHtml = $('.tpc_content:eq(0)').html(); $('.tpc_content:eq(0)').html(blockText); }, 1006);
		setTimeout(function(){ adhtml(tpcHtml); }, 10006);
	}
}
</script>
<script src="//2023.redircdn.com/web/images//post.js?v=1"></script>
